kid_friendly: Would you rather be able to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather have a pet dragon or a pet unicorn?
Would you rather be able to talk to animals or speak every language?
Would you rather have super speed or super strength?
Would you rather live in a castle or a treehouse?
Would you rather be able to breathe underwater or fly in the sky?
Would you rather have a robot best friend or an alien best friend?
Would you rather eat only pizza or only ice cream for a week?
Would you rather be a famous singer or a famous athlete?
Would you rather have a magic carpet or a time machine?
Would you rather be able to read minds or see the future?
Would you rather never have homework or never have chores?
Would you rather be the funniest person or the smartest person?
Would you rather have the ability to teleport or to freeze time?
Would you rather live in a world with dinosaurs or a world with dragons?
Would you rather be a wizard or a superhero?
Would you rather have a tail or have wings?
Would you rather always have to whisper or always have to shout?
Would you rather be really tall or really small?
Would you rather have unlimited video games or unlimited candy?
family: Would you rather go camping or stay at a hotel?
Would you rather visit the beach or the mountains?
Would you rather play board games or video games?
Would you rather have a pool or a trampoline?
Would you rather go to an amusement park or a water park?
Would you rather cook dinner or do the dishes?
Would you rather have a snow day or a sunny day?
Would you rather watch movies or read books?
Would you rather have breakfast for dinner or dinner for breakfast?
Would you rather explore space or explore the ocean?
